meanings.definition: A blog that is maintained and updated using a mobile device.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading my friend's moblog about her travels.
meanings.sent2: She shared a beautiful photo on her moblog from her latest adventure.
meanings.sent3: The moblog of cute cat pictures always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: Her moblog is like a window to her daily experiences.
meanings.sent5: The moblog filled with recipes inspired me to try new dishes.

meanings.definition: To post to a blog using a mobile device.
meanings.sent1: I moblog about my hobbies whenever I have free time.
meanings.sent2: He quickly moblogs updates about his favorite sports team.
meanings.sent3: She loves to moblog about her DIY projects on weekends.
meanings.sent4: Moblogging while traveling makes it easy to share the journey.
meanings.sent5: They moblog daily to keep their followers engaged.

meanings.definition: The act of updating a blog using a mobile device.
meanings.sent1: Her moblog of daily reflections is quite popular.
meanings.sent2: The moblog of breaking news updates is always informative.
meanings.sent3: I find it amusing how quickly he updates his moblog.
meanings.sent4: The moblog of nature photography captures the beauty of the world.
meanings.sent5: Their moblog showcases their creativity and passion.
